00037 class SVDBatchLearning
00038 {
00039  public:
00048   SVDBatchLearning(double u = 0.0002,
00049                    double kw = 0,
00050                    double kh = 0,
00051                    double momentum = 0.9,
00052                    double min = -DBL_MIN,
00053                    double max = DBL_MAX)
00054         : u(u), kw(kw), kh(kh), min(min), max(max), momentum(momentum)
00055     {}
00056 
00057   template<typename MatType>
00058   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00059   {
00060     const size_t n = dataset.n_rows;
00061     const size_t m = dataset.n_cols;
00062 
00063     mW.zeros(n, rank);
00064     mH.zeros(rank, m);
00065   }
00066 
00076   template<typename MatType>
00077   inline void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00078                       arma::mat& W,
00079                       const arma::mat& H)
00080   {
00081     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00082     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00083 
00084     size_t r = W.n_cols;
00085 
00086     mW = momentum * mW;
00087 
00088     arma::mat deltaW(n, r);
00089     deltaW.zeros();
00090 
00091     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00092     {
00093       for(size_t j = 0;j < m;j++)
00094       {
00095         double val;
00096         if((val = V(i, j)) != 0)
00097           deltaW.row(i) += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(j))) *
00098                                                   arma::trans(H.col(j));
00099       }
00100       if(kw != 0) deltaW.row(i) -= kw * W.row(i);
00101     }
00102 
00103     mW += u * deltaW;
00104     W += mW;
00105   }
00106 
00116   template<typename MatType>
00117   inline void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00118                       const arma::mat& W,
00119                       arma::mat& H)
00120   {
00121     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00122     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00123 
00124     size_t r = W.n_cols;
00125 
00126     mH = momentum * mH;
00127 
00128     arma::mat deltaH(r, m);
00129     deltaH.zeros();
00130 
00131     for(size_t j = 0;j < m;j++)
00132     {
00133       for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00134       {
00135         double val;
00136         if((val = V(i, j)) != 0)
00137           deltaH.col(j) += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(j))) *
00138                                                     arma::trans(W.row(i));
00139       }
00140       if(kh != 0) deltaH.col(j) -= kh * H.col(j);
00141     }
00142 
00143     mH += u*deltaH;
00144     H += mH;
00145   }
00146 
00147  private:
00148   double u;
00149   double kw;
00150   double kh;
00151   double min;
00152   double max;
00153   double momentum;
00154 
00155   arma::mat mW;
00156   arma::mat mH;
00157 };

00165 template<>
00166 inline void SVDBatchLearning::WUpdate<arma::sp_mat>(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00167                                                     arma::mat& W,
00168                                                     const arma::mat& H)
00169 {
00170   size_t n = V.n_rows;
00171 
00172   size_t r = W.n_cols;
00173 
00174   mW = momentum * mW;
00175 
00176   arma::mat deltaW(n, r);
00177   deltaW.zeros();
00178 
00179   for(arma::sp_mat::const_iterator it = V.begin();it != V.end();it++)
00180   {
00181     size_t row = it.row();
00182     size_t col = it.col();
00183     deltaW.row(it.row()) += (*it - arma::dot(W.row(row), H.col(col))) *
00184                                                   arma::trans(H.col(col));
00185   }
00186 
00187   if(kw != 0) for(size_t i = 0; i < n; i++)
00188   {
00189     deltaW.row(i) -= kw * W.row(i);
00190   }
00191 
00192   mW += u * deltaW;
00193   W += mW;
00194 }

00197 inline void SVDBatchLearning::HUpdate<arma::sp_mat>(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00198                                                     const arma::mat& W,
00199                                                     arma::mat& H)
00200 {
00201   size_t m = V.n_cols;

00204 
00205   mH = momentum * mH;
00206 
00207   arma::mat deltaH(r, m);
00208   deltaH.zeros();
00209 
00210   for(arma::sp_mat::const_iterator it = V.begin();it != V.end();it++)
00211   {
00212     size_t row = it.row();
00213     size_t col = it.col();
00214     deltaH.col(col) += (*it - arma::dot(W.row(row), H.col(col))) *
00215                                                 arma::trans(W.row(row));
00216   }
00217 
00218   if(kh != 0) for(size_t j = 0; j < m; j++)
00219   {
00220     deltaH.col(j) -= kh * H.col(j);
00221   }
00222
